name: Knowledge base view documents add new folder testcase to check folder functionality

testSteps.description: 1: Knowledge base view documents add new folder testcase to check folder functionality ({menuItem=knowledge base, subMenuItem=view document, targetElement=AddNewFolder, crossButton=crossIconOnFolderName, closeButton=folderNameCloseButton, addButton=folderNameSaveButton, withoutName=})

children.description: Given Verify beta-mis is open and loaded successfully.
When User logins into application with username "arpit.mishra" and password "Gemini@123"
Then Verify beta-mis Dashboard page opens
When Goto "knowledge base" and click on "view document"
And create folder without name and click "folderNameSaveButton"
